alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County; Northwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued March 29 at 10:18PM PDT until March 30 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24 expected. * WHERE...Northwestern Mendocino Interior, Northeastern Mendocino Interior, and Northern Lake County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County; Northwestern Mendocino Interior
